sources.title: The Inside Story (1948)
sources.description: A collection agent arrives in a small town with $1000 for a local farmer. Whilst waiting for the farmer to arrive the money is put in a safe at a hotel for safe keeping. However, it is removed by mistake and solves a number of financial problems before it is returned. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-inside-story-1948/

metadata.Plot: A collection agent arrives in a small town with $1000 for a local farmer. Whilst waiting for the farmer to arrive the money is put in a safe at a hotel for safe keeping. However, it is removed by mistake and solves a number of financial problems before it is returned.
metadata.Writer: Ernest Lehman, Geza Herczeg, Mary Loos
metadata.Actors: Marsha Hunt, William Lundigan, Charles Winninger
